notes: Very modern, high-quality apartment with polished marble floors, recessed lighting, built-in cabinetry, and central air conditioning. The unit is unfurnished and in excellent condition with large floor-to-ceiling windows providing good natural light. For baby safety, the windows have protective railings but the glass display cabinets and sharp cabinet corners may need childproofing; the smooth tile floors could be slippery. No visible balcony access concerns.
